name: Shaping Focus

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Wild shape class feature, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks.

sections.body: If you are a multiclassed druid, your wild shape ability is calculated as though your druid level were four higher, to a maximum level equal to your character level.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: This feat has no effect if you are not a multiclassed druid.
sections.name: Special

description: Your powers of shapeshifting outstrip your dabbling in the druidic faith.
